content: the window cat is a simple pattern knit in the round from the bottom up tail and paws are knit separately also in the round and seamed to the body finishing touches eyes nose and whiskers can be embroidered on or embellished with buttons fabric etc there is no end to the ways that this cat can be personalized dimensions of finished cat are about 12 inches by 7 inches don t forget to check out my tiny window cat 1 pattern too 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tiny-window-cat
